name: Service Role Taxonomy
description: Establish clear naming conventions and architectural roles for services across the codebase. Services fall into distinct categories based on their responsibility, dependencies, and location. Proper categorization improves code discoverability and prevents semantic confusion between domain services, infrastructure services, and adapters.
scope: TypeScript service files in application/services/, infra/services/, and adapters/ directories across all packages

rules.content: Name domain CRUD services with {EntityName}Service pattern for application-layer services that orchestrate repository operations and business logic
Name infrastructure services with {Capability}Service pattern and extend BaseService for cross-cutting concerns that manage lifecycle (init/destroy)
Name LLM provider services with {VendorName}Service pattern for concrete implementations of AIService interface
Name data generator services with {DataType}IndexService or {DataType}SummaryService pattern for stateless transformation utilities
Locate domain entity services in packages/{domain}/src/application/services/, infrastructure services in packages/node-utils/src/*/, and LLM services in packages/llm/src/infra/services/
